prompts.1: This is a level 1 example prompt with very low urgency. This is meant to be calm and informative without any pressure.
prompts.2: This is a level 2 example prompt with low urgency. This prompt suggests a non-urgent matter that can be addressed at your convenience.
prompts.3: This is a level 3 example prompt with mild urgency. This prompt indicates a matter that should be looked at soon but isn't pressing.
prompts.4: This is a level 4 example prompt with moderate urgency. This prompt suggests a matter that requires attention within a reasonable timeframe.
prompts.5: This is a level 5 example prompt with medium urgency. This prompt indicates a matter that should be addressed today but isn't critical.
prompts.6: This is a level 6 example prompt with increased urgency. This prompt suggests a matter that needs attention in the next few hours.
prompts.7: This is a level 7 example prompt with high urgency. This prompt indicates a matter that should be addressed within the hour.
prompts.8: This is a level 8 example prompt with very high urgency. This prompt suggests a matter that requires immediate attention.
prompts.9: This is a level 9 example prompt with critical urgency. This prompt indicates a serious issue that demands immediate focus.
prompts.10: This is a level 10 example prompt with maximum urgency. This prompt suggests an emergency situation that requires instant action.
